Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
We are a web3 community builders in Singapore, learning and sharing web3 news to cryto fans.
NOAA is an agency that enriches life through science. Our reach goes from the surface of the sun to the depths of the ocean floor as we work to keep the public informed of the changing environment around them.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
The National Blend of Models (NBM) is a nationally consistent and skillful suite of calibrated forecast guidance based on a blend of both NWS and non-NWS numerical weather prediction model data and post-processed model guidance. The goal of the NBM is to create a highly accurate, skillful and consistent starting point for the gridded forecast.
National Blend of Models (NBM) Grib2 Format.
